vibesExplanation: The workout is classified primarily as "The Reboot Workout" due to its focus on posture, cool-down nature, and the relaxing aspect of the rowing session. The title "Decompress Cool-Down" and description phrases like "relax into your stroke" strongly suggest a focus on deep stretching and low-stress movement, fitting the Reboot Workout vibe. The music stations "Rock low" and "Global Hits" may not strongly influence the vibe but support a relaxing atmosphere. The "Zen Flow" vibe is also considered due to the meditative and breath-centered quality implied by the phrase "relax into your stroke together," and the intentional focus on posture, aligning with the grounding and unhurried nature of Zen Flow workouts.
